title: Kill And Follow - Novel Updates
author: Di Mo Xian Hu   迪莫仙琥
description: A rich young master, Chu Wei, when running away from home gets targeted by assassins. Barely managing to escape, all alone, he spent a hefty sum of money to hide in Jiang family’s Inn. On the other side, Luosuo assassin’s killer was ordered by the Chu family to kill, yet made a mishap of driving its prey to hide inside what his boss called Demon’s Inn. Let’s see the story of how the two of them kill and love each other unfolds.>
